channel.title: Ponmaalai Kahoot Demographic Insights Feed
channel.description: A curated feed of top 5 demographic-based insights from the Ponmaalai Music Kahoot Game Show.

item.title: Millennial Power Surge
item.description: Millennials make up the largest share of Kahoot players, dominating both participation and average scoring. Their energy and recall speed stand out across all rounds, making them the most competitive demographic group.

item.title: Gen Z: The Fast Thinkers
item.description: Generation Z participants show exceptional reflexes, averaging the quickest response times—3.4 seconds per question—indicating sharp recall and digital adaptability in trivia-style challenges.

item.title: South Indian Roots Shine Bright
item.description: Players born in Warangal, Trivandrum, and Coimbatore frequently top the charts, reflecting how cultural familiarity with Tamil and Telugu cinema deepens music trivia performance.

item.title: Seattle Suburb Supremacy
item.description: Participants living in Redmond, Woodinville, and Sammamish exhibit the highest consistency and accuracy rates, likely reflecting strong community participation among South Indian families in these neighborhoods.

item.title: Generation X: Steady and Strategic
item.description: Though fewer in number, Generation X participants display remarkable steadiness, maintaining performance levels across rounds with minimal score variation—proof that experience balances speed.
